com.philips.pins.shinelib

Interface SHNUserConfiguration


  • public interface SHNUserConfiguration
    Interface for managing user data.

    Includes items like gender, date of birth, age, height, weight etc. But also contains user related preferences such as language and country code, clock format etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  SHNUserConfiguration.ClockFormat
      Supported clock formats.
      static class  SHNUserConfiguration.Handedness
      Supported handedness.
      static class  SHNUserConfiguration.Sex
      Supported genders.

        Returns:

        Character getDecimalSeparator()
        Specifies decimal separator to be used.
        Returns:

        Returns calculated metabolic rate on basis of age, gender, weight and height of the user.
